about_the_game:
25 Missions

Bomber 3 is not a flight simulator, it is an intensely realistic action-adventure recreating the sights, sounds, and split-second decisions of the young B-17 crews in the skies of Nazi Germany. Digitized sound, Animations, and a ten-man crew to talk you through the tough ones.


And so it goes for twenty-five missions, Assuming, of course, you make it home from this one.

You are in control

Put yourself in the captain’s seat of a B-17 bomber, select your plane, select your crew and plot your path over war-torn Europe. Watch your elevation, watch your formation, and watch very carefully where you were over the target. This classic was a bestseller in the early 1990s.

Deadly Games Classic Reborn

Staying true to its original HyperCard heritage the core game will look and feel the same as Rene Vidmer's original, but the game will be delivered on an updated engine.
